ignore.reason: Nested blockquotes are correct in this instance, as they are quotations from a larger quotation with a single source.
Text following ampersands is not an abbreviation so no-break spaces are not needed.
Text following ampersands is not an abbreviation so no-break spaces are not needed.
Ampersands are part of an old-timey style in quotation and so no-break spaces are not needed.

Matched text is a signature to a letter and does not require ending punctuation.
